title: Ticket #612: Latest condor_dagman panics out of fd with 10,000 + nodes
description:
condor_submit_dag -maxpre 100 movieruns.dag

run directory containing the dag is in your home on submit.chtc.wisc.edu

capture dagman using gdb set break point @ _condor_fd_panic use lsof to get current list of open files

/usr/sbin/lsof - dagmanpid

Greg wants to see if perhaps dagman is leaking fds
remarks: This was actually a problem with the fd limit being set differently for condor jobs than for the user's shell -- not a problem with DAGMan. (wenger 2009-07-07)
creator: bt
